article.title: Resident Evil 4: Wii, receives 9.5 from Famistu
article.author: digg
article.summary: Two editors awarded the game a perfect 10 out of 10. The other two were still impressed enough to award a score of 9. Two editors awarded the game a perfect 10 out of 10.
